channel.title: Comments on: The Final Saving Throw
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Yes, I did. Tycho and Wil Wheaton also had great posts about Gygax
item.content:encoded: Yes, I did. Tycho and Wil Wheaton also had great posts about Gygax

item.title: By: Monica

item.description: Did you see the XKCD today? Very fitting...
item.content:encoded: Did you see the XKCD today? Very fitting…

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: I heard it on NPR this morning. They quoted a figure of 20 million D&D players. The game's cultural impact beyond role-players is huge, though -- think of all of the films and books and games that wouldn't exist if Gygax and Arneson hadn't invented that first little boxed game.
item.content:encoded: I heard it on NPR this morning. They quoted a figure of 20 million D&D players. The game’s cultural impact beyond role-players is huge, though — think of all of the films and books and games that wouldn’t exist if Gygax and Arneson hadn’t invented that first little boxed game.
